name: fe7b5ade-93fe-528e-be1a-f27c0aae95d7
notes: Near Real Time data is automated processed data. the ICOS Ecosystem station NRT data is Net Ecosystem Exchange CO2 flux and energy balance variables. The usually half-hourly data are quality checked and flagged following several standard processing schemes described by the ICOS protocol, including tilt correction, turbulent tests and friction velocity threshold. Data should be available within 10-30 days after actual measurement. Produced by the ICOS ETC (Ecosystem Thematic Centre).
title: ICOS ecosystem near-realtime observational data
